TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InternetMessageHeaderCollection extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ComplexPropertyCollection`1<class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.InternetMessageHeader>
Public NotInheritable Class InternetMessageHeaderCollection Inherits ComplexPropertyCollection(Of InternetMessageHeader)

span.span: Represents a collection of Internet message headers.

summary.span: Чтобы получить всю коллекцию заголовков сообщений Интернета, используйте свойство PR_TRANSPORT_MESSAGE_HEADERS.

span.span: To get the entire collection of Internet message headers, use the PR_TRANSPORT_MESSAGE_HEADERS property.

span.para: The following is the definition for the PR_TRANSPORT_MESSAGE_HEADERS extended property.
You can add this property definition to the object to get the Internet message headers.
For more information about EWS and Internet message headers, see “Getting Internet message headers” in EWS, MIME, and the missing Internet message headers

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.InternetMessageHeader Find(string name) cil managed
Public Function Find (name As String) As InternetMessageHeader

span.span: The name of the header to locate.
Finds a specific header in the collection.

returns.span: Объект InternetMessageHeader, представляющий заголовок с указанным именем; NULL, если заголовок с указанным именем не найден.

span.span: An InternetMessageHeader representing the header with the specified name; null if no header with the specified name was found.
